content.en: [Program will start as planned in five minutes.]
content.cn: 【程序将在五分钟后按计划启动。】

content.en: A cold machine voice sounded in the darkness.
content.cn: 在一片黑暗中，响起了冰冷的机械声。

content.en: The air trembled a bit, and calm down soon.
content.cn: 空气微微颤动了一下，马上又平静了下来。

content.en: A faint light was lit.
content.cn: 亮起了一道微弱的提示灯。

content.en: The slowly flashing lights illuminating the dust floating in the air.
content.cn: 缓缓闪烁的灯光照亮了空气中浮动的灰尘。

content.en: But soon, the floating dust falling down to the ground again.
content.cn: 但很快，飘起的尘埃又飘落回了地面。

content.en: Getting back to the silent darkness.
content.cn: 又回到了那寂静的黑暗中。

content.en: [Program will start as planned in two minutes.]
content.cn: 【程序将在两分钟后按计划启动。】

content.en: The machine voice sounded again.
[Start pre-running checking.]
[Start hardware checking.]
All of a sudden, the machine voice continues to appear.
content.cn: 突然的，机械声开始接二连三的出现。

content.en: The vibration of speaker make the dust floated up again.
content.cn: 扬声器的振动让灰尘再次漂浮了起来。

content.en: The air began to be restless.
[Squeak... Squeak... Squeak...]
All kinds of small noise which came from motors spread.
content.cn: 各种微小的马达声四散开来。

content.en: The LED flashes more frequently.
content.cn: 指示灯开始加快闪烁的频率。

content.en: The floating of dust also more intensely.
content.cn: 尘埃的飘动也更加剧烈。

content.en: [Hardware checking completed.]
[Program will start as planned in one minute.]
content.cn: 【程序将在一分钟后按计划启动。】

content.en: [Start standing assistance checking.]
The machine voice came to be much more frequency.
Suddently, dozens of motors began to run together.
content.cn: 突然间，数十个马达同时开始运转。

content.en: The sounds of power supply fan and gyro become quite noisy in a quiet environment.
content.cn: 电源风扇，陀螺仪的声音在安静的环境中变得十分嘈杂。

content.en: The sound of something collision occurs.
content.cn: 出现了物体碰撞的声音。

content.en: It seems something is awaking.
content.cn: 像是有什么苏醒过来了。

content.en: It is awaking in the original darkness and deathly stillness.
content.cn: 在这本来的黑暗与死寂中，苏醒过来了。

content.en: [Standing assitance checking completed.]
[Program will start as planned in 30 seconds.]
The machine voice again.
The LED stopped flashing, keep wakey.
content.cn: 提示灯已经停止了闪烁，保持常亮。

content.en: Everything quiet down.
Leaving dust dancing around.
[Program will start as planned in 10 seconds.]
[Countdown start.]
The LED went out suddenly.
The machine voice began to count seconds regularly.
content.cn: 机械声有规律的报起了秒数。

content.en: [Five.]
[Four.]
[Three.]
[Two.]
[One.]
[Program is starting as planned.]
[The lighting is about to turn on.]
[Completed.]
[AI is about to disconnect. Transfer control to nerve centre.]
content.cn: 【AI即将断开连接，控制权转交神经中枢。】

content.en: [Completed.]
It's so dark...
It seems it's still early now.
How do I suddenly woke up?
And why...
I was standing on the ground?
Is that somnambulism?
The things will come with mention?
content.cn: 这种事情说有就有的吗。。。

content.en: Terrible.
Or is that...
Started by the AI?
But I don't remember I have set the automatic waking.
content.cn: 可我不记得有设置过自动唤醒啊。

content.en: There is no programme to see in evening recently...
content.cn: 最近也没什么深夜档要看的。。。

content.en: The AI must be broken.
I think I should ask dad...
...to fix it...
Eh...
What's that?
What I wanna say just now?
Who I wanna ask for fixing?
I can't remember.
Is the memory module broken, too?
It would be a little serious.
I wonder if there is any engineer on duty now.
content.cn: 不知道现在有没有值班的工程师。

content.en: I should find anyone to fix it for me.
I think my battery is in a low level.
content.cn: 我觉得我的电量不是很多了。

content.en: It can be charged when I stand closing to the wireless charging station.
content.cn: 在这个无线充电口附近站一会可以充电。

content.en: It will be terrible if the battery consumed on the road.
content.cn: 要是走路的时候没有电就糟糕了。

content.en: The battery consumes a lot when I'm moving.
content.cn: 运动的时候耗电还是很厉害的。

content.en: There's a electronic notes on the wall.
content.cn: 这面墙上有一个电子笔记。

content.en: Let's have a look at it.
I think it will be useful.
(Close to it and press F on keyboard to check.)
The door seems to be locked.
I can't open at all costs.
Why there's nobody here?
content.cn: 为什么这里一个人都没有？

content.en: Though it's early now, there won't be no one on duty in normal case.
content.cn: 虽然时间还早，但平常一直会有人值班的啊。

content.en: What happened indeed?

12/24/2015
Today is Christmas Eve. Time really flies, and again a year later. I'm very busy this year, and stay in laboratories almost every day. The pressure of all kinds of tasks pushed me hard. Even so, the time living with them is really enjoyable. Children are very sensible, gave me a lot of power of struggle. Tomorrow is Christmas. He must be looking forward to the gift this year. However the toy car I sent him last year seemd not loved by him. Though he seems very happy when he received it. He didn't touch it after playing for a few days. But this year's gift must surprise him. It will be fine if he like it. And so I will be very happy, too.
content.cn:
2015年12月24日
今天是平安夜。 时间过得真快，一年又要过去了。 今年一整年都很忙，几乎每天都在实验室里，各种任务都压的很紧。 虽然如此，和他们一起生活的这段时间真的很愉快。 孩子也很懂事，给了我很大的奋斗的动力。 明天就是圣诞节了。 他一定很期待会得到什么礼物吧。 去年送的那辆玩具车，好像不是很喜欢的样子。 虽然收到的时候很开心，可是玩了没几天就不碰了。 但今年准备的这份礼物，一定会让他大吃一惊。 要是能喜欢就好了。 那样我也会很开心的。

content.en:
6/5/2016
Important notice from the leader. Due to the ever-accelerating speed of the spread of pollutants, B6 zone will also be affected. Related departments please make well preparation, strengthening ideological education to the residents, and accelerating the progress of evacuation. Related researchers please persist on the front lines, affording the best support for evacuation.
content.cn:
2016年6月5日
来自上级的重要通知。 由于污染物的扩散速度日益加快，B6区也即将受到影响。 请有关部门准备好应对措施，加强对居民的思想教育工作，加快撤离进度。 相关科研人员请坚持奋斗在第一线，做好撤离的保障工作。

content.en:
7/10/2016
Notification. Due to the shortage of electricity supply, the purification laboratories closed temporarily.
content.cn:
2016年7月10日
通知。 由于电力供应紧缺，净化实验室暂时关闭。
